data.comment: The match is underway at Incheon Football Stadium.
Kim Jin-ya is back on his feet again.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Seoul in the half of Incheon Utd.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Incheon Utd throw-in in Seoul's half.
At Incheon Football Stadium, Incheon Utd are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 5, Free kick Seoul.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Incheon.
Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
Elias Aguilar for Incheon Utd gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 13, Jong Hyeok Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
In Incheon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Incheon Utd have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Incheon Utd close to the penalty box.
Incheon Utd's Elias Aguilar breaks free at Incheon Football Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Seoul at Incheon Football Stadium.
In the minute 17, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seoul.
Kim Nam-chun (Seoul) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Incheon Utd goal kick.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
Throw-in Incheon Utd.
In the minute 21, Seoul to take a throw-in in Incheon Utd territory.
Can Seoul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Incheon Utd's half?
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Incheon Football Stadium.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in the half of Seoul.
Seoul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Incheon Utd goal kick.
Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 36, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Seoul throw-in in Incheon Utd's half.
Seoul drive into the zone and Han Chan-hee is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Can Incheon Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
In the minute 40, Incheon Utd pushes forward through Elias Aguilar, whose finish on goal is saved.
Incheon Utd have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
In Incheon, Elias Aguilar (Incheon Utd) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Seoul at Incheon Football Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Incheon.
Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Incheon Utd.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Seoul.
Can Seoul capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Incheon Utd's half?
Seoul's Osmar Barba gets in a shot on goal at Incheon Football Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
At Incheon Football Stadium the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over at Incheon Football Stadium.
In the minute 45, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kim Jin-ya.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Incheon Utd make their first substitution with Song Shi-uh replacing Kim Jun-beom.
Sung-Yueng Ki is replacing Han Chan-hee for the away team.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Kim Jin-ya with Han Seung-gyu.
Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Incheon Utd to take a throw-in in Seoul territory.
In the minute 50, Seoul have a goal kick.
In Incheon Seoul drive forward through Han Seung-gyu. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Incheon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 60, Ko Kwang-min (Seoul) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Seoul needs to be cautious. Incheon Utd have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 63, Attention is being given to Seoulâ€™s Sung-Yueng Ki and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 65, Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team has substituted Sung-Yueng Ki with Jung Han-min. Kim Ho-young is thus making his third change.
Kim Seong-ju is on a sub for Kang Yun-gu for Incheon Utd.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
Goal! Song Shi-uh gives Incheon Utd a 1-0 lead in Incheon.
In the minute 73, Stefan Mugosa with an assist there.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
In the minute 77, Seoul are coming forward and Osmar Barba gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Seoul at Incheon Football Stadium.
Choi Beom-kyeong is replacing Stefan Mugosa for the home team.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Incheon Utd.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Incheon Utd.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd.
In the minute 86, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Incheon Utd close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Incheon Utd at Incheon Football Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Incheon.
In the minute 88, Seoul drives forward and Han Seung-gyu gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Incheon Football Stadium.
Throw-in Seoul.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Seoul throw-in in Incheon Utd's half.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd just outside Seoul's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Incheon Utd in Incheon.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
Choi Beom-kyeong for Incheon Utd has been booked by Jong Hyeok Kim and receives a first yellow card.
